text: Super Fuzz (), also known as Super Snooper is a 1980 Italian American Spanish crime comedy movie directed by Sergio Corbucci and starring Terence Hill, Ernest Borgnine, Joanne Dru, Marc Lawrence, Sal Borghese, Woody Woodbury. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 crime movies Category:1980 comedy movies Category:1980s criminal comedy movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:American crime movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Spanish crime movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sergio Corbucci Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Super Fuzz
